website_summaries.verdict: Offers great coverage that is ideal for those with mature skin or those looking to conceal under-eye circles.
pros: Helps reduce the look of fine lines while also providing light-to-medium coverage for imperfections and dark circles
Can also be used for highlighting and contouring
Blends easily, lasts all day, and doesn't settle into fine lines
cons: Not ideal for those looking for true full coverage

customer_reviews.title: Great undereye and scar coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years under my eyes, and have found that it blends and covers much better using a wet brush to blend after using the sponge applicator. It eliminates the cakey buildup and settling into creases that I originally experienced. I also recently had plastic surgery to revise a large dog bite scar on my lower lip and chin, and use this to conceal the incision while it heals. The pictures are one month post surgery with and without the product. It covers very well and is barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Best Concealer I've Used
customer_reviews.text: Best under eye concealer ever. I am 67 years old, have tried them all and I wouldn't go out without applying this concealer. It blends nicely with my foundation and has never caked. The sponge applicator is soft and makes application quick and easy. I will continue to use this product and hope, like many products I've used over the years, that it doesn't get discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Morty

customer_reviews.title: I was excited about this because I have great luck with maybelline products but had never tried the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this because I have great luck with maybelline products but had never tried the concealer. I really disliked the applicator though. The makeup soaks into the sponge more than applied to my face. But the concealer itself is pretty great. The makeup stays on a long time and conceals as it should, I just wish it was more of a lip gloss applicator. Ignore my messy mascara butt the pic below is with the dewy maybelline fit me foundation, this concealer, maybelline colossal mascara and maybelline blush as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jsmoot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for eye bags!!!
customer_reviews.text: Im a very pale person, so i bought the Fair one. It's perfect for my eye bags and darkness. I've been used one from Lancome, but these so much better!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Covers my scar, great coverage, not thick
customer_reviews.text: Overall very good product, decent size and a good price. Even though the product isn't meant for covering scars I put it on my surgery scar and it covered it. I'll post before and after pictures, although i would recommend this as a scar cover because it's meant for your face as concealer it probably won't last on a scar just showing everyone how it covers! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Not Just For Women!
customer_reviews.text: I am a man, a heterosexual male but I have to admit to some vanity. Sometimes I party too late and when I do, it's pretty noticeable the next day at work. Rather than be known as the party animal, I blot a fw touches of this below my eyes and those dark circles are almost imperceivable. No one has ever noticed, not even my gf although I did have to fess up when she found it in the master bath. I told her the truth for once and I don't think she believed me?
customer_reviews.author: Joey Angel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shade and doesn’t cake up
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this product it blends flawlessly with my skin!
customer_reviews.author: FABDOLLSHAIR

customer_reviews.title: I love Fenty but Instant Age Rewind is great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I wear Fenty but this brand is half the cost and gives the coverage just as great as Fenty which is quite expensive. I ordered 2 initially and I'm happy I did leaving for vacation. I figured why take the expensive stuff since I will be outside or at the beaches. Wow was I surprised and happily surprised! I added the with and without pictures for your reference and you can see the dark circles clearly and not even a small bit on the after..what a difference a small amount of coverage will do for your under eyes! My color is Tan.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I used to conceal under my eyes and I matched the shade perfect considering I ordered it online
customer_reviews.author: f.r.

customer_reviews.title: Calling all Night-Owls
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend this product if your concealer ran out or you're looking for a new one. I have light-medium skin with yellow undertone so it can be difficult to find a concealer that does make me look like a ghost or make it seem as if I cake my face. This one is just the perfect shade and so far, there's no problem with it. 《Bottom line》 A great thing to have in hand for those who are prone to being night owls, but don't want the cons of being one shown on their face the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Applicator does not work...Product is Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to order & receive this but very disappointed. Gave it 1 star just because 0 stars is not an option. Opened the package & tried, tried & tried again to get the applicator to release some concealer liquid. Nothing came out. Like patting a dry sponge over my skin. Finally, after repeated attempts, on different days, some concealer appeared on the applicator sponge, but sadly none would transfer to my skin. Sounds nice, looks nice but is totally worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Rae

customer_reviews.title: Works great for under eye circles
customer_reviews.text: I have tried countless concealers for my under eye circles—most of which cost triple the price of this one by the way. I figured I’d try this on a whim because the reviews were so great and it was so inexpensive. It’s officially become my new favorite concealer. It’s not cakey, it blends easily, it doesn’t crease and it lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: If you don't respond well to matte, do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a very matte, very fast dry down, this may be for you. I took an instand dis-like to it. Just hate it. I purchased the brightener as it said luminous look, but it is definitely matte, matte, matte...and very dry in about 60 seconds. It grabbed every pore it got near and made it look bigger. I think this would look good on camera or if you respond well to matte finish foundations etc. Otherwise steer clear. It looked terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: For all my fair-skinned makeup lovers, just a heads up, Fair - 110 is not as light as the pictures make it appear on here. The image is way washed out making it appear to be a very light color. It's not. I got mine and it is way darker than I expected, and plus when you put powder over it to keep it from creasing it is going to get even darker because this causes oxidation. Don't bother if you're pale. I know 6-7 bucks isn't a lot, but it was all I had to spare for concealer this month, so I will have to go without for a while. :(
customer_reviews.author: Angelia Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Useless - waste of $ None of the product comes out of the bottle. It's impossible to even use! I even went to two friends to get them to try to get the product out of the bottle. The contents may be very good, but I'll never know, because it's impossible to apply it!
customer_reviews.author: Illana H. Weintraub

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite product
customer_reviews.text: I am a mom of a 12 year old with autism. He keeps me really busy and doesn't sleep well at night so I am never getting enough sleep. With that being said, I get dark circles under my eyes. I hate having the tired worn out mom look so I decided to try this. I put it on and loved it immediately. I love the brightener. It helped cover my dark circles perfectly. I would definitely recommend and will be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: *** YOU NEED TO LET THIS SIT BEFORE RUBBING IT IN**** Miracle for Olive Skin + Dark Circles
customer_reviews.text: READ IF YOU THINK THIS IS TOO WATERY -- you need to let this concealer sit for a few seconds after applying + before rubbing it in in (until it gets tacky, i usually wait at least 30 seconds). I didn't think it worked until I learned this little tip from a Youtube vid, and now this is my holy grail. I have been using this stuff for about 8 years now and swear by it. It literally makes my dark circles disappear. Maybelline recently changed the packaging, but the formula is the same. I recommend this stuff to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought this due to the high ratings on Amazon and am extremely pleased. It's thick and creamy but blends easily and well. I put BareMinerals powder on top of it to seal it all in and my face looks great. Does not make my face look goopy or done in the way some foundations or concealers do. I use it under my eyes to hide dark circles and to cover acne spots. With powder on top it stays put. Used to buy $30 Lancome concealer but this coverage is way better and at a fraction of the cost. Nice job Maybelline!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Helps me and my under eye area quite well as you can see in my photo
customer_reviews.text: Yes I have purple hair LOL, but my skin is showing signs of aging now and especially around my eyes and I have tried all kinds of concealers and for the money this works quite well . I like the sponge applicator as well, it helps when I dot this on then use my sponge to blend blend blend ... Good product for the money .
customer_reviews.author: Zoey Zo

customer_reviews.title: Not for Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: It's not for dry skin, will be very cakey if you have dry patch. Light coverage, cover nothing in my face.
customer_reviews.author: ShirleyQ

customer_reviews.title: Completely covers, depuffs and addresses anti-aging all in one!
customer_reviews.text: Without concealer, I look like I've gone a few rounds with Tyson (hereditary). I also tend to wake up with puffy eyes. I've tried numerous products from caffeine serum to heavy duty Tarte Shape Tape, but this is the only product that not only completely covers my circles without looking heavy & sinking into my tiny lines, but depuffs & treats! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer but an annoying design
customer_reviews.text: I have really dark circles under my eyes and always have, and this definitely makes me look like I've slept and am not a vampire, so that's good. The top often falls off, which is annoying because it's round so it rolls around. I've gotten lots of these because I go through them quickly, and this has happened with all of them. Sometimes I never find the top again and the whole thing dries out, which is annoying. But I really like the product itself. It stays on forever. I use it generally as a concealer, not just under my eyes. It's easy to apply and would be really easy to reapply if you had to, but you don't.
customer_reviews.author: R. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Too cakey and settles into every line!
customer_reviews.text: I have really pale skin. I’m also a Mom with very little sleep. My skin is normal to dry, lightest shade of fair in foundation. I was looking for something with fair to yellow undertones. I read review after review. I purchased the 120 Light / pale. This is as heavy as a foundation. It’s also buildable but it settles into every line, especially ones I didn’t know I had. It’s too dark, even with the slight yellow undertone. The shades they show on the description do not do this any favors. It just doesn’t show up as promised. Second photo is after 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMommyLoves7

customer_reviews.title: My opinion changed!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this 10 years ago and hated it. BUT. I recently decided to try again, after watching some videos. 1st. Hydrate before. 2nd. Hydrate again. 3rd. Use a finishing spray FIRST. (say what! I know what I just said- seriously. Try) 4th, less is more. Pat gently into skin with a warm finger. Set it immediately. And TA-DA! My old eyes actually look younger! And I have hated everything under my eyes, for about 15 years now. But not anymore! I got a darker shade for contouring. I'm CONTOURING! Oh what a wonderful new world!
customer_reviews.author: V.J.P

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS, I got it in golden which has a yellow undertone and works great with tan/caramel complexion. The coverage is great and buildable.
customer_reviews.author: Shera ♡

customer_reviews.title: Blends so well!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I have semi-dry skin, so I had to apply a bit of oil on my face prior to using it. But other than that, it blends well! I used it with my Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer (shade walnut) and my makeup looked pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviewer

customer_reviews.title: it’s moisturizing, and covers well.
customer_reviews.text: It matches my skin tone perfectly. I’ve never been able to claim that for anything. On days when I’m just running errands in the neighborhood, I use this where I need it, under eye circles (almost disappears - mine are bad, but covers well), laugh lines (no laughing matter 😑), but it helps, and anywhere else I need it. Blends very well. I have sensitive skin, and was a bit hesitant, but it actually helps; no drying affect, it’s actually moisturizing, no irritation for my sensitive skin. I purchased 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: D. Abdelnabi

customer_reviews.title: Only face goop I use
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this just for under eye concealer, but laziness getting ready has shown me I don't need to mess with other products when I'm having a decent skin moment. I use this all over, Pat it with a brush or blender or fingers and then I'll add one extra layer under my eyes again or blot it on top of a red spot. I have like ten of these. And it's still not enough
customer_reviews.author: Nasha

customer_reviews.title: Works great as part of a system, and when blended out
customer_reviews.text: I heard about this from my favorite beauty blogger, so I bought it and I’m glad I did. It works great to conceal my dark circles under my eyes. I use the peach color corrector by Pixie, then this concealer, blend it out with a damp beauty blender, and then set it all with the Laura Mercier Secret Brightening Powder. It works like magic to cover my dark circles. This concealer alone doesn’t do the trick. And it applies weird and splotchy with the attached applicator. But if I use it as part of my system, and blend it out with a damp beauty blender, it works great. I’m glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: S Guffey

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Seriously.
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely picky when it comes to makeup and I am impressed. It blew me away honestly. I will buy again... and again. I am a medium beige toned kinda girl but I bought Light in this and the color is perfect undereye as a brightening concealer. There is no yellow tinge and it blends out perfectly into my slightly tanner skin below. Get it, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: DC19516

customer_reviews.title: good coverage!!
customer_reviews.text: this concealer has quite a good converge on MY dark circles!!! it can be pricey but im glad once alot a while 😂i can find deals here on amazon❤when i first got this one was for 4 bucks and im on my second order (just finished) the other one. this is my honset thoughtz i like it , im happy with its description , its features and its gives. i love maybelline products .
customer_reviews.author: amhy01Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this finally. It's excellent for the price point as a drugstore concealer. To get the advantages of course, this needs to be applied the right way and in the right order if wearing other makeup. I'm MAC NC45 with very dark undereye circles. I used this concealer in Caramel and it works well even without the brightener or neutraliser. I will definitely be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, but the makeup is great if you can get to it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the *make up* but hate the container! This is a GREAT concealer. It matches my skin perfectly and really improves the look of my under eye circles. Unfortunately, the design of the applicator is horrible and I can't get anymore of the product out unless I were to smash it open somehow. If only they would have this in a normal tube with an applicator the way most other concealers come. Even if the product would come out, the little sponge on the end gets filthy. Very bad design!
customer_reviews.author: ThatPainterChick

customer_reviews.title: Must have been Very Old Product?
customer_reviews.text: Packaging says it may take some time for the product to come up from the tube into the sponge. Weellllll - After a few minutes’ twisting, I started timing. 15 minutes and nada. Again a little later, 10 minutes. The faintest bit of pink showed in the sponge, but the sponge itself was totally dry. My assumption is this was Very Old Product. It’s come to its final resting place in my trash bin. And I’m not going to try again.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Does not work...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dark under-eye circles after reading reviews on this site and others. It does not work. I used the Neutralizer along with the correct color concealer. The color was good...it just didn't cover any darkness.
customer_reviews.author: Wildcat

customer_reviews.title: Yellowish
customer_reviews.text: Attached is a photo with the medium tone applied to the left side but not the right, for comparison. I have very light, slightly reddish skin and I usually use fair makeup. Instead I ordered the "light" one. It went on smooth and had good coverage but it was still too light and yellowish on my skin. Then i ordered the medium, and though it's also pretty yellow, it matches with my skin aside from that.
customer_reviews.author: Mothra

customer_reviews.title: Mature skin light coverage, no foundation needed!
customer_reviews.text: I am over 50, done with the 9-5 world, and rarely wear full foundation anymore - but won't let anyone see me with a naked face :) . I use this to cover some spots and red areas and broken veins. Also dark area in corner of eyes. Follow with a little blush and then a bit of eye makeup. Easy! I use 'light' color, I have no tan on my skin. Sponge tip is easy to use and blends nicely. I hope they don't discontinue, but they always do eventually. I'm on my 2nd tube, each lasted me about 2 months. Back to order more - I'm stockpiling this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Liz W

customer_reviews.title: Pain to get it open!
customer_reviews.text: The product would not come out on the little sponge applicator and it doesn't allow you to open the bottle any other way. I couldn't even get a drop out. Not sure if it was just that I got a defective bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ambrosia

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite concealer, it's very easy to apply and lasts ...
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite concealer, it's very easy to apply and lasts all day for me. I bought it on pale and covers my dark circles well.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Aguero

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been?!
customer_reviews.text: I have the hardest time covering the dark circles under my eyes. This stuff is AMAZING! Easily buildable, long lasting, and great color matching. Will definitely buy again (and again, and again!)
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Bosarge

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a product that works
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I’ve discovered the brightener! Concealers have never, ever been the right color for me. They never really blended in well. The brightener is more of a pink shade, which matches my skin tone SO much better. Plus, it does give my face a more “bright” appearance. It’s super easy to apply (I love the built-in applicator) and it doesn’t smear or streak. It’s a subtle difference that actually makes a pretty big impact, IMO. I’ll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: Best EVER coverup!
customer_reviews.text: Maybelline must never stop selling this, it is the only cover up for my skin condition that works. It’s a God send for people like myself with folliculitis, a condition that leaves awful sores on the face, arms, back, legs. This cover up is perfect, I have many friends using it. It has replaced my makeup and people cannot tell I even have sores. I love this cover up “thank you Maybelline. And no I am not paid to write this...
customer_reviews.author: Kat Wood

customer_reviews.title: Inferior, Inoperable Delivery Design
customer_reviews.text: After so many glowing reviews, I had to try this miracle product. I ordered the "light" color. It arrived and I was NEVER ABLE TO EXTRACT it from the dispenser. No matter how many clicks I turned it either way, no product-the applicator sponge remained DRY. Really Maybelline? Over the course of a few days and many attempts to utilize this life changing elixir, the sponge applicator eventually tore away which lead to more twisting and clicking but STILL NO LUCK. I cannot even say that I have tried it as it is TRAPPED INSIDE THE FAULTY DISPENSER. I will continue to use my MAC product-at least I can access it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good luck guessing which color to order...
customer_reviews.text: No idea what color to buy..don't see "neutral" option that some reviewers refer to. I wear neutral Clinique, buff, foundation, which is fairly light so I got the light in this product. It looks stark white against my face and the back of my hand! It is too white and doesn't cover as well as I hoped it would... not sure if I will try another color. I have been told by makeup people that my skin is neutral undertones and fairly light when I buy foundations... I do tan though and have a little color this time of year... maybe it will work more in the winter?
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 stars Decent concealer, a bit chalky but may have bought too light of a color
customer_reviews.text: 3.5 stars Bought this because many reviews say this is just as good as TARTE creaseless concealer. For me, it’s not. It’s not as emollient which was my expectation. BUT so far after 4 hrs yes it’s creaseless. Maybe I’ll try a darker color to mix with this one, I got the neutralizer color but it’s way too chalky on me BUT the product isn’t that drying. It’s very light and concentrated with pigment. Also the pigments are very well dispersed— it doesn’t look like I have tons of makeup on.
customer_reviews.author: Buying_Time

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of 2 separate articles I read saying this stuff was amazing. I honestly don’t see what the hype is about because I’ve already gone back to my ELF undereye concealer. Pro: I did really like the sponge applicator that this one has though! The twist top is also easy and fun to use. Con: The concealer itself has okay coverage but was suuuper drying and started flaking after I applied it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C

customer_reviews.title: Fave Concealor
customer_reviews.text: This concealer in shade 110 Fair works well with my very fair olive/neutral undertone combination skin. The shade has that elusive "grey"/olive-y/pinky-y undertone that I find rare in drugstore shades. This concealer has the perfect medium coverage, can be layered easily over problem areas without looking caky. It is very lightweight on the skin and drys matte. I use this concealer to cover acne and redness, I personally don't recommend for under-eyes, it is not moisturizing or full coverage for my preferences. I like to spot correct with this concealer and leave my freckles out for a nice natural look. It stays all day after I set it with loose powder and nyx dewy setting spray.
customer_reviews.author: cajunprincess

customer_reviews.title: As good as YSL's Touch Éclat - and way more value for your money!
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it works! For the past 10 years I've spend approximately 42 bucks/2 months on Yves Saint Laurent's Touche Éclat, Radiant Touch. Couldn't live without it. I've tried many potential replacements, always too thick, too shiny, not light enough, not covering enough, covering too thickly - you name it. This one is actually as good as the YSL Touche Éclat. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: Orange Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it- works great on sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I was a little hesitant because of the color “light” since I have tan skin but it worked perfectly with my Clinique foundation. It goes on smooth and you can either dab it or roll it will the sponge applicator. I have very sensitive skin and this hasn’t bothered me at all. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mc

customer_reviews.title: Just dab and go
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this product is awesome. I dont wear much makeup, especially during the pandemic, so I love how this just dabs on and erases darker shades of old blemishes, under eye circles or blotchy eyelids. Literally, just dab and go. The spongy top distributes just the right amount of cover. I got lucky and seem to have picked the right shade, or maybe it's just a very versatile product. I'm 57 years old and I dont find that it settles in my wrinkles, so it must have enough moisture for mature skin. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Light

customer_reviews.title: Settles in lines
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low and read so many reviews to try and find a make up that would not pool in my fine lines under my eyes. According to all I read I thought this would be it but it’s not. I rarely even bother using it because it’s the only part of my make up that ends up looking bad because it settles in my under eye lines. I’m only 40 and my lines are not horrible so for it to do this is disappointing. The search continues
customer_reviews.author: alison beitzell

customer_reviews.title: Buyer-beware: Neutralizer is ivory-pale.
customer_reviews.text: I have light skin with yellow overtones, but dark purplish circles due to allergies, and from all the reviews and recommendation, I ordered Neutralizer. But it's so white, I look like one of those sailor/skier types who's always outside in sunglasses. Also have to be careful applying, the crank-it-up thing has a hard middle so if you dab a little too hard you could do more damage.
customer_reviews.author: S. Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: did not fiction this time
customer_reviews.text: this time does not work. I have ordered many before, but this tube will not turn to emit the make up. sorry for delay in evaluating but I jut opened it and found this out.. it usually clicks in the turning but there was never a click. thus the make up came out all ver and no control of the dispensing thereof. Any possibility of sending me a new one? I purchase this quite frequently. and love it...when it works! thanks, Pam
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years now. Bought it originally as a concealer for dark areas under my eye, but soon started using it to cover the occasional blemish, and it's fantastic. I recently ran into an issue getting the same product I have always used in the shade that I need. Couldn't fine it anywhere, and I suspect that this is because there is now a product out with a different description on the packaging and the colors have changed.So I was thrilled to see this to purchase at such a great price, and in a 2 pack.
customer_reviews.author: Kristinave

customer_reviews.title: I've tried a ton of concealers and this is my go to
customer_reviews.text: I have some pretty heavy dark circles due to bad sinuses and this is the concealer that does the trick for me. I have pretty light skin and have tried different colors but I find the brightener one to match my skin tone the best and to blend the best. I have one that's almost a yellowish tint and on really bad days I'll use a touch of the yellowish one and then top it with the brightener. I've recommended this concealer to my friends and think it's worth giving it a try - I hope it works for you too.
customer_reviews.author: ButtonsTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Does not blend well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because it had great reviews. Unfortunately, it did not work for me. I have very dark circles, and I need to use concealer every day. I use Mac Pro Longwear, and it works great, but the tiny bottle is $25 + shipping cost. I tried wearing it after moisturizer, and it didn't work. I tried moisturizer and primer and it didn't work either. I tried a combination of moisturizer, primer, and even translucent powder and it still didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Oyarzabal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer! The twist to get the product out lets you control the amount of coverage you want which can be full or light coverage. Lately I've been into a more minimalist natural makeup look where I try to focus more on skincare and skip the foundation, so I use this to cover up little blemishes, my under eye area and any redness around my nose and the coverage on this thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Oneisha

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I have really dark circles under my eyes from allergies. This is the first concealer I've found that actually covers them without horrible clumping. I bought the neutralizer; maybe that's the difference between this and the products I've purchased in the past. I hope this isn't discontinued any time soon (which always seems to happen to products I love) because I will be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am getting on in years, and now have crepey inner corners of my eyes plus dark circles. Makes me look tired all the time. This product does a pretty good job of covering dark circles, although not perfect. Cooperates okay with my eye cream -- some concealers ball up or flake off. Good price for a not bad product.
customer_reviews.author: DesDaz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent concealer. I bought it in fair, because I have light skin. It matches really well. It has a pink undertone, which is perfect for my skin. The texture is creamy and blends really well. I like the built in sponge. I do use my ring finger to blend. If you had really oily skin you might not like this. My skin is normal so this works perfect for me. The texture is pretty thick, which I like because I have really dark under eye circles. It doesn't look heavy though. The effect is very natural. I mostly use it under my eyes but it can be used anywhere. Wonderful product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie - MI

customer_reviews.title: Great skin match, but dries too quickly
customer_reviews.text: I'm honestly still amazed at how well I was able to find a skin match. I bought this product because I have seen Mari Maria use it in her videos. After using for a few weeks, I've stopped because I notice that it dries too quickly and leaves unblended dry spots, even when I'm quick to blend it in with my sponge blender. I may check out other Maybelline products with this shade, however. Note that the applicator gets messy because the cap is only slightly bigger than the application sponge. The sponge also seems to favor the product on one side, without even spread.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: Breaks and won't dispense
customer_reviews.text: I like this product so I bought a couple of extra to store. When I opened it the wrap was difficult to remove and then the dispenser would not work. The second bottle did the same thing. Both were completely unusable. They were obviously fault. I liked the product but will not buy again and want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh, not the best not the worse
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from this concealer, and don't think it delivered. It's fairly thick, so less is more. The click tube and product container is what I like most. I find it easier to apply. I just couldn't wrap my head around the consistency for some reason. I'd previously used Shea Moisture's concealer and loooved it, but can't find it anywhere. After I blend out the Maybeline, I find it creases and just doesn't sit right. When I set it with powder, this is corrected, and therefore I still gave it a few stars. As far as quality, it doesn't hold up to other concealers I've used.
customer_reviews.author: SHOE ADDICT 1982

customer_reviews.title: Awesome concealer!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome concealer for those with yellow undertones. I'd say I'm a light-medium tan shade and I purchased the 30/130 of this concealer. I'm not really into heavy makeup or "highlighting." I'm more into that natural look, me-but-better, type of thing and this is the perfect shade! It up dark spots pretty well and has all day staying power. I love the little built in sponge tip which makes it easy to apply, though I use my beauty blender to blend it in. Anyway, if you need a really good concealer but don't want to break the bank, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: BRKLYN

customer_reviews.title: Works well for under eye issues
customer_reviews.text: I must say I am very impressed with this concealer. I have used every concealer under the sun from luxury brands to drugstore and this works best for my under eye circles. I have fair skin so my under eye issues are more due to a bluish dark color rather than just dark so it is much harder for me to find something that works. I do still use my own makeup sponge to blend but the applicator on the end does work as well. I also use a peachy color concealer first but that is something I do no matter what makeup I wear that day. Overall, I would definitely recommend giving this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye Concealer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a couple months now. My skin which is some what sensitive is enjoying it. The sponge like end allows me to perfectly apply the amount I need under my eyes (well after some practice :) The design makes it easy to spread evenly. I apply it after my moisturizer & my skin remains soft. It blends in nicely with my matte powder. It truly covers the dark circles under my eyes. I purchased a “medium” & my skin is more beige like if that helps. An excellent addition to Maybelline’s makeup product line. Quality at a reasonable price. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome concealer for mature skin!
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is outstanding for mature skin. I'm 45 and of course have some fine lines and wrinkles under my eyes. This product doesnt crease or get cakey. It goes on nicely and evenly and really brightens areas that are darker. My fine lines arent accentuated. They are much more unnoticeable with this product. It's very easy to blend with your fingers or a beauty sponge. And the applicator is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Ryan

customer_reviews.title: hard to get out of the bottle
customer_reviews.text: i had no issue getting this product to work the 1st 2 times, but after that i tried standing bottle upside down twisiting where the arrows are ,can't get it to come out of the bottle anymore so, yeah i would not buy again after i bought it and read even more reviews i saw that other people mentioned the same issue.not a happy customer. i also do not see anyway to message the seller.smh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this concealer. I usually use the liquid concealer with the wand from Maybelline because it works great,but ladies this Eraser Concealer is my new favorite concealer. I suffer from dark circles because I suffer from chronic pain d/t my illness and don’t get a ton of sleep so I need full coverage all over my face but more so under my eyes... this does the trick! I have a light complexion and use the light concealer. You gotta try it... it’s a must have in the makeup 💄 bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Quedens

customer_reviews.title: Worst Ive ever used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because it was geared for aging skin. I have deep set eyes so that means I naturally have a larger area to cover under my eyes. As I'm now middle-aged I have some fine lines in this area, and this sunk into my lines worse than anything I have ever used and made them look so much worse! I will either just use this as a spot treatment to cover blemishes, or it will go in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: McGee

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer, and so cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I've used many concealers over the years, some better than others. I never buy Maybelline products, but after reading the reviews I figured I might as well give this one a try considering the price. I was very happily surprised. This is the best applicator I've ever tried and the coverage for dark circles or blemishes is very good. There are also so many colors to choose from, unlike most concealers. And I don't find that it settles into lines around my eyes as long as I blend it a little with my fingers. Love this product! Love the price!
customer_reviews.author: Book Fiend

customer_reviews.title: Happily surprised.
customer_reviews.text: The older I get, the more the dark under eye circles appear. The one thing that helps: gain weight in your face. Yeah, not something I want to do either. I'd heard from many sources that the Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Eraser Dark Circles "really works." I've used it for about a week now. I will say that this is the best under eye eraser I've ever found. Sadly, it doesn't completely erase them which is why I gave four stars instead of five. It's not really realistic to think anything will erase your eye circles. But that's what make up is all about: hope and promises. The price is good. I'd recommend giving this product a try.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: This product is very good.
customer_reviews.text: I am in my late fifties and I'm always looking for something to help with my dark circles and/or age spots. Each time I try a product for this it either accentuates my lines, cakes, or requires pulling the delicate skin in order to blend. This product does none of the above. It goes on very light and smooth. I just use my ring finger to tap it until it is evenly distributed. I have also used it for a few age spots and actually, sort of all over my face. It's so light and doesn't feel heavy like foundation does. I will definitely buy more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Davis

customer_reviews.title: I hate how much I like it
customer_reviews.text: I do hair, so I'm usually elbows deep in water and am always wiping my face. I live in Austin and have allergies, so I'm always touching around my eyes. I know you're not supposed to, but hey, desperate times. The makeup around my eyes is usually the last to go. This stuff holds up. I'm saying this even though I really don't like Maybelline usually
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Not that Good
customer_reviews.text: Everyone on Youtube is raving about this product for covering discoloration and dark circles. Well, I have bought all the colors and tried them all. The formula is too thin. Even when applying additional coats it does not cover my discolorations or my dark circles or broken capillaries. I have been very disappointed in this Maybelline product. A better full coverage concealer is the Master Studio by Maybelline. It actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Color CreativelyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: hard to manage - doesn't fill well
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could just return this but it has been opened and attempted to be used. the makeup does NOT fill well and requires multiple attempts to even get a small amount out. I do not wish to press hard on my skin in order to use this product- will never purchase again will not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true, but it’s actually true
customer_reviews.text: I loved that this product matched my skin so well. It looks so natural! It’s definitely a great product. I even started just using this concealer instead of foundation because it’s so easy and convenient! I would have to disagree that it’s better than other concealers I’ve tried- IT cosmetics makes the best under eye concealer, but it’s extremely expensive (it does last a long time, to be fair). This is a good alternative. It didn’t bother my sensitive skin or dry me out. It also doesn’t look greasy. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this because of all the great reviews! But honestly it didn't work very well for me at all. It faded really quickly (like within a couple of hours) and didn't seam to do much at all for my dark circles. It's just a pretty standard cheap concealer. It's pretty thin, and would probably be good if you are someone who like very light/no makeup. I was excited about the applicater but it wasn't good either, I ended up blending it with my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. I have some problems with the product settling into the fine lines under my eyes, though. I've tried with and without various setting powders, and it's still an issue. Sometimes it's really bad lol The coverage is also only "ok". I have dark circles, and this doesn't hide them as well as I'd like. All that being said, it's not an awful product or anything, just kind of mediocre.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I’m as pale as a ghost made of diamonds, and this stuff brightened my pale skin!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Keeping it simple: - Longer lasting than you’d expect. - Brightening and lightening of those shady and rudely dark under eyes, even after a night of watching The Notebook and fighting with your boyfriend all night because he didn’t cry and has no heart - LONG WEAR!!! I touch my stupid face all day long, and this stuff stays on! - Anti-Aging, I’m as pale as your average ginger, which means I’m prone to wrinkles. I am 29 and do not have any wrinkles, which is a feat to say the least! Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: nicolehula

customer_reviews.title: How Do You Choose?
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a store that carries this concealer to test what color is right for me. Unfortunately, you can’t tell from the listing whether the one you selected will work for you or not. The concealer is nice and not too heavy, as the concealer was that I used in the past. I want to camouflage the circles under my eyes, as many of us do, and am still looking for the magic one. I got one that was just labeled “Concealer” and should perhaps try Fair.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Smooth , non creasing , matched. My new fav !
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the concealer spread on smooth without dragging the under eye skin. The hardest part was opening up all the cellophane that encasing this product. Harder than usual to cut and peel off. Then you have to turn and turn the applicator so that the concealer comes they the sponge. Once I got thru that , the color matched and it didn’t not sink into any creases which several brands do. It stayed in place and did not fade away either. I now completely switching to this brand and threw all my other concealers away.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: ANOTHER FAULTY DISPENSER
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser does not work. I now see multiple reviews with same issue. I pressed MULTIPLE times as some suggested but only got very small amount on sponge. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: C. L.

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: The liquid itself is good, the casing is not. You must twist and dab around your eye. The sponge that covers the tip is not gentle, on the eye socket. It hurts when you dab around. It hits me every time I have to apply. I’m hitting my eye socket with every dab. When I go lightly, it does not apply. I do not recommend this item. The only reason I gave it 3 stars, is bc the liquid is great. It stays on overnight. It blends well and is smudge proof. It sucks that the container is not good. I wish they’d improve the sponge on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovely! Perfect coverage and leaves the skin feeling good after you wash it off! No creasing or caking! Easy application and a little goes a long way! I use it as a regular concealer and not just an under eye concealer. I used to use expensive concealers that used to cake up and crease during the day and leave the skin feeling damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Drying. Irritating to the skin.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Drying. Irritating. I read good things about this product. So I guess it works for some but wow I only used this for a couple of days. It dried out the skin under my eyes so bad I looked 20 years older. Luckily was able to moisturize the hell out of the area and it went back to normal after a couple weeks. It does blend well either. Ugh. Again soooooo drying!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AKA1991

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a time with finding a good shade and finding a product that doesn’t cake and crack on my face. This stuff is great. Creamy, smooth, and matches my skin tone. I can put it under my eyes only and go without additional makeup and it looks natural. And the price is certainly right.
customer_reviews.author: Catty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for busybodies who need light/medium coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is the best concealer I own and I have Fenty, Nars, and Too Faced. I have dry, sensitive skin and was looking for something on-the-go to cover up a significant scar with hyperpigmentation and dark circles; this has been the best so far. I used it without foundation so I may need a lighter color for when I do wear a full face of makeup. The price is amazing for such a highly effective product. I love the applicator and only use a cheap sponge to blend it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product for brightening up dark circles under the eye
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product to minimize dark circles under your eye. Make sure you use an eye cream to moisturize and let it dry completely. Then apply this eraser and it will brighten up your eye area. Nothing can completely take away dark circles if you have them, but this definitely brightens up the area to minimize the dark areas under the eye. I would only apply in the corner and go halfway under the eye. If you have mature skin use a small amount In your dark circle area and dab with your weakest finger. You want it to look natural and just brighten. It’s not a concealer, it just brightens.
customer_reviews.author: candyce condon

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Lately I’ve noticed that I have dark circles under my eyes. I thought I would try this Maybelline instant age rewind eraser, But I feel I like I wasted my money. The product is a little difficult to dispense and it’s very dry feeling. When I try and rub it in under the sensitive area under my eyes I have to rub quite hard to get it spread correctly. It feels very dry. I probably will end up pitching this into the trash can and I’ll be on the lookout for a better coverage and more moisturizing concealer.
customer_reviews.author: CAV

customer_reviews.title: Brighten Is Very Pink
customer_reviews.text: Im very fair and wanted to really brighten the eye area that often looks bluish. However, it shows up a darker pink. This will work ok as a base for highlighting on someone, but it is too dark pink to work as an actual concealer for any skin tone. I will still use it for other things, just wish I had known it would be this dark of a pink or I probably would have chosen a different shade. I will say that it doesn't irritate the skin and does cover quite well without feeling heavy. The actual formula feels nice just has a very off color.
customer_reviews.author: SomeoneOutThere

customer_reviews.title: Allergic to it.
customer_reviews.text: I have to be careful with makeup around my eyes due to allergic reactions. I was hoping this would be okay. I bought several new makeup items and used all the same day. My eyes were burning and watering so I wasn't sure which new makeup was causing it. Today I applied only this and Yep.. watering, burning eyes. If you have sensitive eyes wearing makeup, you may want to pass on this concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: Great drugstore find for the makeup junkie
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting to try. After a friend of mine had it and loved it, I bought it. Both of us are makeup junkies and typically purchase more expensive makeup. But this is a great drugstore find and you can’t beat the price! I’ve never been a big concealer fan, but being in my late 30s now, i need a little under the eye and over the eyelids. Before this, I was using Clinique's airbrush concealer pen, but this is much better for the fraction of the cost. I love the applicator tip and how easy and quick it is to apply. My mom saw me use it and now she’s a fan, too!
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Strange applicator
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Strange applicator! The sponge applicator is so big and the "clicks" only make product come out in certain spots on the sponge, so it goes on uneven. The color is true though, no orange tint to it! UPDATE: After a couple weeks, the "strange sponge applicator" came off completely and I can't get it back in. Good under eye concealer but bad application design. I have to throw it away because now it's drying out. I won't be buying this design again, I'll be trying another product.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy77

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who are pale and proud.
customer_reviews.text: I use shade 105 in the fit me collection. I am fair skinned and the brighter works great for covering up my dark cirlces. Sometimes this is the only thing I'll need, when I'm having blemish free week. I'm 32 and starting to see fine lines, so I will update if later. This also works great as spot cover on my acne. I use this mainly as a concealer and it's not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it's a great product if only I could open it
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's a great product if only I could open it. It's been three days and I am lost. Finally, after struggling with scissors and a knife, I've exposed the sponge. But it's dry and I can't squeeze the color into it. Apparently there's more clear wrap but I don't see it. Wish someone could help. Three stars are based on hoping I can eventually figure this out :-(
customer_reviews.author: Marlee Davis

customer_reviews.title: concealer what it is and why we need it or why some need it
customer_reviews.text: so I chose to buy this product because it was a still as far as price goes and my roommate would always tell me about her concealer well I now know what concealer is it is a makeup which is used to conceal bumps bruises little slight scratches if I maythis product is outstanding in amazing when I seen how it can conceal something that is there and make it look like nothing is there and keep the skin looking natural and healthy this one is one that wants you buy because it works it really really works.
customer_reviews.author: Ivelezzy speaks the truth. only.!.!

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer ever. It is lightweight and matches my skin color perfectly. I don’t usually bake it, still it lasts all day long. The combo I use is the fitme matte foundation, rcma translucent powder and my real techniques sponge along with this concealer and I look flawless all day. Totally recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nabilia Bueno

customer_reviews.title: holy grail
customer_reviews.text: This is my holy grail concealer, and I have used the Tarte Shape Tape, the most popular concealer (I hate that one). It is such a thin consistency, but so opaque and covers any dark spots, dark circles, and doesn't crease what so ever. I don't even have to set this with powder. Of course it's a plus that it's anti-aging and has a bunch of good stuff in there for your skin. I have the fair shade, and the brightening shade for contouring.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Melovidov

customer_reviews.title: Covers great
customer_reviews.text: I never would have thought to order a Maybelline product, but I saw where a previous reviewer referred to herself as a make up snob. I guess I think along those same lines. But she gave the product such a rave review I had to try it. And right she was. It covers dark circles under my eyes wonderfully. It goes on easily & just takes a small amount. I will always have this on hand. Maybelline made a believer out of me. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: beachwine

product_meta.title: Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Eraser Dark Circles Treatment Multi-Use Concealer, Light, 0.2 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description:
Color:120 LIGHT| Size:0.2 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)This dark circle eraser concealer instantly creates a radiant, refreshed looking eye area. Infused with goji berry and Haloxyl. Packaging may vary, what you receive may not be what is reflected on site. • Instantly erases the appearance of dark circles and fine lines • Under eye concealer visibly diminishes the appearance of puffiness • Eye area looks radiant and refreshed • Anti-aging dark circle treatment contains goji berry and haloxyl to help erase appearance of dark circles and fine lines Step 1. Twist collar of the applicator until the concealer is visible on the sponge (may take some turns on first use). Step 2. Apply concealer to the under-eye area and blend. Step 3. For extreme dark circles, apply the Neutralizer under concealer. Step 4. To add luminosity, apply the Brightener to the inner corner of eyes, cheek, brow bones and bridge of the nose. The Dark Circles Eraser is protected by an anti-microbial system. Do not wet applicator. Wipe off excess eye concealer with dry tissue.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Maybelline instant age rewind concealer: America's #1 Concealer Erase the look of dark circles, correct the appearance of redness and brighten the look of dull skin with Instant Age Rewind Eraser multi-use concealer.

Anti-aging concealer: Turn back time with this anti-aging under eye treatment concealer infused with Haloxyl. Say bye bye to the look of fine lines, blemishes, redness, and dark circles, and hello to a radiant, well rested, refreshed looking eye area

Best face forward: Maybelline has sheer, medium, and full coverage foundation in liquid, stick, and cushion foundation formulas, and a range of concealers, plus face primers, contour, highlighter, and pressed powder to help you create a perfect canvas.

Maybelline has what you need to create any look--foundation, bb creams, concealers & highlighters to create a perfect canvas, eyeshadows, brow pencils & eyeliners for any eye look & lip products, from showstopping matte lipstick to au natural lip balms.
Remove maybelline makeup with micellar water: Use Garnier Micellar Water as a gentle makeup remover at night, and as a facial cleanser in the morning to prep skin for Maybelline makeup.

specifications.Manufacturer: Maybelline-Garnier-Essie, Consumer Products Division of L’Oréal USA S/D, Inc.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
